text: Joliet is a city in Illinois in the United States. Joliet is 40 miles southwest of Chicago, and is the county seat of Will County. About 150,000 people lived in Joliet as of the year 2020. From 1990 to 2010, Joliet was one of Illinois' quickest growing cities, and one of the quickest growing cities in the United States. It is also home to the Chicagoland Speedway used by NASCAR annually. == References == Category:Cities in Illinois Category:County seats in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:1833 establishments in the United States Category:1830s establishments in Illinois
title: Joliet, Illinois
